alert.note: Alert for Bay; Midland; Saginaw (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bay, Saginaw and Midland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 555 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Mount Pleasant to 7 miles northwest of Elsie to Laingsburg. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Marion Springs around 610 PM EDT. Coleman and Oakley around 615 PM EDT. Chesaning and Merrill around 620 PM EDT. St. Charles and Freeland around 630 PM EDT. Midland around 635 PM EDT. Auburn and Bridgeport around 640 PM EDT. Saginaw, Kawkawlin, Zilwaukee, Linwood and Munger around 645 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Fenmore, Crump, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Indiantown, Bombay and Hemlock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for southeastern Michigan.
